DataElement.preferredName: Molecular Analysis Complete Remission Confirmed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Techniques for studying or analyzing the genetic composition and mechanisms of living organisms at the molecular level. May refer to the understanding and manipulation of genes (DNA)._The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured._Confirmed; having been established or verified._Text term to signify an affirmative response, negative response, or indication that an event did not occur.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Techniques for studying or analyzing the genetic composition and mechanisms of living organisms at the molecular level. May refer to the understanding and manipulation of genes (DNA)._The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured._Confirmed; having been established or verified.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Techniques for studying or analyzing the genetic composition and mechanisms of living organisms at the molecular level. May refer to the understanding and manipulation of genes (DNA).:The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured.

Concepts.definition: A laboratory procedure that involves the study of tissues, cells, and fluids using DNA/RNA analysis techniques for the identification of characteristics and abnormalities at the molecular level.
The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmed; having been established or verified.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify an affirmative response, negative response, or indication that an event did not occur.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Affirmative response to a question or activity.:No value exists.:No Value Exists:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
